intent_atoms.description: Traversal Guard logic must be implemented according to DOCS/AI/Tolerance_Parsing/Traversal_Guard_Requirements.md and verified via DOCS/INPROGRESS/Summary_of_Work.md.
Wire decoder failure issues into CLI/app summaries once aggregation APIs land, following T1.5.
VoiceOver regression pass must confirm focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets on macOS and iPadOS hardware.
Real-World Assets (Dolby Vision etc.) must be secured before regression baselines can shift from synthetic payloads.
Snapshot & CLI fixtures should be refreshed whenever schema updates are intentional via ISOINSPECTOR_REGENERATE_SNAPSHOTS=1 swift test --filter JSONExportSnapshotTests.

functional_units.name: Traversal Guard API
functional_units.description: Provides guard logic for traversal operations, including telemetry hooks and fixture support as per Traversal Guard requirements.

functional_units.name: Tolerant Parsing Decoder Failure Propagation
functional_units.description: Exposes an aggregation API that surfaces decoder failure issues into CLI/app summaries during tolerant parsing.

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Accessibility Shortcut Verification
functional_units.description: Offers a verification workflow to ensure VoiceOver focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets on macOS and iPadOS hardware.

functional_units.name: Real-World Asset Licensing Management
functional_units.description: Manages licensing approvals for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4 and MPEG-H fixtures used in regression baselines.

functional_units.name: Snapshot and CLI Fixture Refresh Tool
functional_units.description: Automates refreshing of JSON export snapshots and CLI fixtures when schema updates occur via a regeneration command.
